title: Appraiser’s Job - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Depictions of Cruelty   Dungeons   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Guilds   Hidden Abilities   Magic   Male Protagonist   Monsters   R-15   Special Abilities   War Records
author: Takayanagi Shinra   高柳神羅
description:
“I will appraise all of you”

Appraiser Io does his job of appraising everything from monsters brought in to the adventurers guild he’s attached to, to examining an ambitious young man’s aptitude for adventuring, and the diverse areas in which he’ll succeed.

And today, while surrounded by his colleagues, a butcher who believes himself to be the height of physical beauty and a feminine, yet aggressive-looking, guild master, he appraised several items, entertained an adventurer, and ran through the occasional dungeon. And so this is how he passes his busy days, all while in the corner of his heart he thinks, “One day the time will come where I’ll get to rejoice over the stress of a big job.”

Here is an everyday story depicting the adventures of how this anywhere and everywhere sort of appraiser passes his days.>
